summary: This is an email chain from January 3, 2020, between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel discussing a potential upcoming '60 Minutes' feature on Jeffrey Epstein. The email notes the feature is 'on the death' and that there is a promo on the show's website.

persons.name: Margolin, James
persons.role: Contractor, U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Appears as a recipient (Cc) in an internal email chain about a potential 60 Minutes feature on Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Potential 60 Minutes Feature on Epstein
events.description: An email discusses information that the news program '60 Minutes' might run a feature on Jeffrey Epstein on the upcoming Sunday night.

keyFacts: Internal DOJ email discusses media coverage of Epstein's case, specifically a potential '60 Minutes' feature.
The email subject and a reply indicate the feature is 'on the death' of Jeffrey Epstein.
The communication shows the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was monitoring upcoming media reports related to the Epstein case in early January 2020.
